channel.title: JavaScript on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on Introduction

item.title: Modular Programming in JavaScript
item.description: I was learning ES6 about two weeks ago, and it reminded me of how modular programming in JavaScript was done during the years prior. I’m quite happy with how JavaScript has evolved, I would even say that I’m starting to like it. Before we go into the “How to do modular programming in JavaScript today”, I would like to give my thoughts on modular programming first.

item.title: Learn JavaScript again
item.description: It is time to learn JavaScript again for me as I just started in a Chingu team project last week. Our team decided that we’ll make something that is inspired by the Momentum browser extension. Now, on to the part where I write down what I learned this week.
